column1: I have tried so many moiture controlling products and this is by far the best yet. This product is easy to apply and doesnt leave my skin feeling oily. I have used this for a few weeks and I have havent had nearly as many breakouts as I did using these other products I have bought. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I was pretty sceptical about this moisturizer. But I tried it for a week+ and it did not break me out, clog pores, leave me greasy, sunscreen, and it has no scent. That is all a plus in my book!! The only thing I want crazy about is if you dont let it fully dry before putting on foundation it will leave your foundation looking funky. I would purchase this product. I received this product free for my honest review. This review is in my own words. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differing is a different acne treatment because it doesn't clog pores. I absolutely love this moisturizer oil control with SPF 30 sunscreen. It's perfect for my combination skin. It's so gentle and soothing when I apply it to my skin. I love that it's not greasy feeling at all. I also love that it hydrate's and protects my skin all day long. I am happy that it's fragrance free and that it has UVA/ UVB protection. Overall very pleased with this Sunscreen. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Differin oil control moisturizer Is so moisturizing while remaining non-greasy, non-oily and not clogging up my pores. My favorite feature is that it also doubles as an SPF 30 sunscreen. I wore this every day while on vacation at the beach for two weeks straight and it did a great job of protecting my combination skin. I did not have to worry about reapplying. I would certainly purchase this product again in the future and recommend it to my friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have sensitive skin and get little bumps when I use most moisturizers but I've been using Differin for a few weeks and I love how it feels on my face and I have not any breakouts at all. It feels very light on my skin, absorbs quick and my skin doesn't have that shiny look after applying it.There is no perfume smell either! I really love that that this is a moisturizer with sunscreen. I feel good knowing that this is not only moisturizing my skin but also protecting it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Iv used this for a few weeks I like it! It's not oily, light weight. The only thing that I didn't like is it made my skin a little sticky after drying. The fragrance is minimal. I am starting to see a difference in my pores. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this as a sunscreen more than a moisturizer , it's doesn't stink, and it doesn't make my skin feel grease , I have combination skin and this absorbed really quickly and it's good base before my makeup, I love the practical dispenser . If you have dry skin stay away! But if you have oily skin this is for you! A great sunscreen that it doesn't leave the skin grease and that it doesn't smell awful! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am really enjoying this Differin Oil Control Moisturizer with Sunscreen. I have always struggled to find a moisturizer that doesn't leave my Tzone oily after a few hours. This is a first, and I couldn't be happier. Plus, it actually absorbs excess oil and has 30 SPF. Ithe consistency is like a thin lotion, and to me it smells like a sunscreen. It absorbs fairly quick and leaves my skin soft. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product! I have sensitive and acne prone skin, and I couldn't find a good product that would work for my skin but my dermatologist recommended that I used differin but I eventually began using the moisturizer and it has helped my skin so MUCH

Differin Oil Control Moisturizer acne treatment because it keeps my skin moist while taking care of my acne. Felt very soothing to my skin. I also shared it with a friend to try out and received positive response from her. Would be buying more once this one is over. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have tried dozens of sunscreens, and this one is the best for the face. It is lightweight, and doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy or looking white. It is also affordable.

I LOVE this Differin Oil Control Moisturizer! It works wonderfully! It goes on light, makes my face feel great, and really does battle the oil. I have noticed a huge difference in my skin since using this! HIGHLY recommend! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love it!! This product is great and I recommend it to anyone with bad acne problems. I also recommend all Differin Gel products such as moisturizer and lotion. Thank you for this amazing product.... [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Been working great so far. It really renews your skin!
I have very oily skin and this did not help or absorb into my skin at all!!!
very lightweight, but... leaves my face really red right after application

I really liked it and it helped my skin better than before. It came at the right time since it was offefrr fro free to try. Especially now that we are going into summer the rainy weathefr here took a toll on my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Feels great on my face. Not oily or tight feeling after applied. It's light and I noticed no breakouts when using it. It's a good sized bottle and will last for a long time. It has no smell which is appealing to most people but I like a lotion to have a smell. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I tried this out because my skin is constantly either oily or dry. Theres no in between. So i tried it out and it works as expected. I would definitely recommend it. The only thing is i didn't really like the smell [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer has SPF protection and is light weight. I wear it under my makeup every day and it does not feel cakey and helps my makeup apply smoothly. I love that this has SPF protection as well. SPF is very important when it comes to skin care and is often over looked. Thanks Differin for the great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have oily skin and have tryed many moisturizers and that have irritated my skin and caused breakouts. I tryed this for the first time 3 weeks ago and its works great for my face. It obsorbes excess oil and dont clog my pores. It also has sunscreen added which I love because I am outside alot and need the extra protection. Its thin, white and very creamy. Its goes on so smooth and lightweight. I absolutely love this moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using this product for a month now. I'm wearing it in winter/spring Cleveland so I have not been able to test the SPF. I prefer the feature of SPF since I want protection every day. The lotion goes on smooth and soaks into the skin right away. It is light and not oily. I can apply makeup right over it without the worry of the makeup not going on evenly. I really like this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

It's a good light/non- greasy moisturizer for oily or acne prone skin. I liked how it doesn't shine or becomes oily after application. Love it especially during spring and summers. It has spf, doesn't irritate the skin nor break outs [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Differin Oil Control Moisturizer is very hydrating on the skin. It's not greasy and no scent that I could smell. Feels nice and light which to me is important during the day. Controlled my oily skin nicely. Only thing I will say that is it currently winter where I live so controlling oily skin is quite easy. The true test will come when I wear it during the summer in the heat and humidity. But for now it's a winner in my book and I will continue to use it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been using this for a while now, while I think it's been helping a little bit it's not what I'm looking for. I want something that works a little faster and better. I did like how it obsorbs into the skin though. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a really nice product. It goes on easy and is lightweight. Doesn't clog my pours. I like that their isn't any strong fragrance in it. I can wear it all day and be comfortable. Doesn't make my face greasy at all. I wear my makeup over it with no problems. I love knowing my face is protected with this product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The only thing I don't like about this product is the smell. Personally, I think it stinks. I would say overall love, aside from the smell, I like it. Comes out very smooth and does not seem to heavy or thick. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Goes on very thick like sunscreen and smells like sunscreen. Great for use as a sunscreen, but not very sure about the moisturizing ability. It absorbs easily into the skin and doesn't leave behind a typical sunscreen type residue. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Starting using it and a matter of 3 days my skin was noticable cleaner feeling. Less red and scars were fading. I would definitely recommend this to anyone wanting a change in your skin. It will change your life. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Ive tried and tried everything OTC for acne. Im 33 yrs old and have suffered with breakouts since i was 12. Comparing this product to countless others, this one is definitely in the top for long lasting oil control. It doesnt dry out my skin or smell horrible either and has reduced my pimples by 75%. Not a complete cure but definitely noticeable results. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is perfect for me. I have fair, sensitive, and dry skin. My skin feels hydrated and soft after using this as a daily moisturizer. It does a good job at protecting my skin against the sun. It absorbs quickly and is non-greasy. I have gotten sunburned, but only from not reapplying after constantly sweating in the hot Texas sun for a few hours. It does not cause blemishes. All-in-all this is a great daily moisturizer that contains sunscreen. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Works really well and not too greasy. Keep skin feeling great. Really enjoyed using this and will buy more to keep handy. My sons skin sucked it right up and looked so nice instead of scaly and dry. Xo [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've been struggling with the balance between dry skin and clogged pores for a few months now. Then enters differin! I have sensitive skin overall and I don't like most scents either so finding the right face product for me can be a real challenge. This worked better than I could hoped! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I liked this moisturizer it not only helped acne be a little more controlled but it made my skin smooth and soft. It didn't dry out my skin like other acne products and it was not sticky. It soaked right in and helped my rough skin too. I got a sample for free to test and try and give my own opinions on which are 100% my own. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The differin oil control moisturizer does just that,it kept my skin moisturized yet wasn't too greasy and allowed my face to breathe while being soft. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for great moisturizer! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is a great product that moisturizes and promote healthy skin. Waaay better and cheaper than going to a dermatologist and spending 200 plus dollars. Worth every penny and will be replacing my proactive [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like using Differin moisturizer because it does not feel oily. I personally do not like using any moisturizer that feels too oily. My wife and I have been sharing it and she had commented several times how much she likes this moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have gone through several well-known brands of moisturizer and finally found something that works for my face. After using for a few weeks, my face is no longer dry but isn't oily either. I don't use everyday, but every other. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have combo skin, so I wasn't really sure about this product to control oil. Especially throughout my day of work. But it actually did okay! With a good toner. I'm also worried about it just sitting on my skin making my oily stone look worst [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product, it is super light not greasy at all and has a nice light scent. Works great, we live in the South where the sun is intense and this lotion gives great coverage. The lid makes it easy to use, I throw it in my gym bag and it doesn't leak. I highly recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have always used a moisturizer for my face and some of them leave my face feeling really greasy. I love that this moisturizes without that greasy feel. I am super happy with this and will be switching! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have severe acne prone skin, and this moisturizer does wonders! it doesnt break out my skin, and isnt oily. Its light on my skin and moisturizes so well! I have never had a moisturizer work so well! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really love this moisturizer because it keeps my face moisturized while also keeping it from getting oily. It has SPF in it which is a nice plus. I usually have pretty sensitive skin to a lot of products and I haven't broken out from this product which is great. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I've used this for about 2 to 3 weeks now. I like to use it after my oatmeal face wash. I enjoy this face wash because it is good at controlling the oil on the skin which I have excessive. It is allowing my face to clear up by keeping the oil from creating blackheads. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love that this moisturizer wasn't greasy on my skin so it didn't cause me to have any break outs and left my skin feeling very soft. Absorbs quickly and it also has spf 30 sunscreen to protect skin from burns and early aging effects from the sun. This Differin Oil Control Moisturizer is now in my go bag so I remember to apply my sunscreen when out and about. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like that this is a moisturizer with sunscreen to help remove acne. I did notice a change in my skin after using. It's made a nice improvement after 2 weeks of use. It does have the sunscreen scent to it which I don't mind but may be strong to others. I would definitely recommend to others. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I usually skip moisturizers because they leave my skin looking and feeling greasy. I am able to use this daily and it has really kept my skin smooth, non greasy, and most importantly non clogging, I usually have a problem keeping my pores clear. I will continue to use this & it has definitely saved my skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This was very gentle on my skin. It hydrated my skin. I have noticed less breakouts. It makes my skin soft and smooth after use. It applies smoothly. I would recommend this product to my friends and family. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been dealing with acne for the majority of my life. I have combo/oily skin and good moisturizers are hard to find. This moisturizer is lightweight and doesn't feel thick or tacky on the skin. I love the fact that it is oil free since I'm originally an oily mess. There is no scent which is a plus. It makes me look less oily throughout the day and doesn't dry me out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is excellent for my acne prone skin as it hydrates and soothes without causing more blemishes which normally occurs. This moisturizer feels lightweight, but still effective and after I few days my face already looks less dry than it did previously. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had used regular Differen gel before and loved it so I was super excited when I saw that there was also a moisturizer. The Differen brand has done it again it works great. I definitely recommend these products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This worked nicely without drying my daughter's skin. I've noticed a big different in her acne and I couldn't be more happy. It doesn't leave a greasy feet and doesn't sting her skin like other acne treatments she has tried [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this on a recent cruise in the Caribbean. Worked great. Not too thick. Provided Good coverage. Did its job. I like knowing it was good for my skin, too. I used it daily and did not break out. Would buy again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is fine for making sure my skin doesn't crack during the dry winters, but it doesn't give me that same refreshed feel that I have with other moisturizers. It's a "good in a pinch" to use as a backup to my regular moisturizer. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

The Treatment is wonderful I see it making a difference on my skin and would recommend anyone to use it. GREAT PRODUCT and it is affective to use on your skin for you need to help with bad acne products [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I usually have a very oily skin so I was hesitant about putting more stuff on my face. However after using this on my face, it wasn't oily or dried out. Very smooth and creamy mosterizer! Would definitely recommend to family and friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin Moisturizer with Sunscreen Broad Spectrum SPF 30 doesn't clog my pores or make me break out. Isn't heavy feeling on my skin. It absorbs well into my skin. Doesn't leave a oily or sticky feeling on my skin. It does smell like sunscreen some though. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm always looking for a moisurizer for my face that does NOT add any oil or greasiness. I felt that this one from Differin absorbed fast and after usisng it for a few weeks, I didn't have any breakouts from it so I definitely approve. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like this product, the oil control properties are beneficial, especially in the hot and humid months. I just wish the bottle was bigger. Having to apply every two hours will make me go through this bottle in a few weeks. It also can't be worn if wearing make up, great for make up free days. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really enjoyed this product! It didn't feel heavy or oily. It felt like a moisturizer. I had no issues with my skin while using it as well. It was gentle on my skin and absorbs really quickly. It doesn't leave my skin dry and its already cleared most of my acne. Watch out summer, I'm here with clear skin! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is great for my acne prone skin..its not too heavy or greasy and doesnt leave a residue like some will and best of all it protects me from the suns harmful rays..i can put it on everyday with or without make up.Its been a great addition to my daily beauty routine! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Differin Oil Control Moisturizer helps absorb excess oil and does not clog pores.
Another added factor, is this formula also has Sunscreen SPF 30 as an ingredient.
Take care of acne prone skin, and helps prevent sunburn. Good product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is my first time using Differin face moisturizer and I really like it. It is very light and not greasy. My skin is prone to being shiny and this moisturizer keeps my face fresh and has no shine. I will definitely continue using this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I received differin oil control moisturizer foe free in return for my honest opinion. I really like this moisturizer was non greasy formula was perfect to wear under my makeup. Its lieght wieght doesnt feel like its waying you down. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I loved this product! It made my skin nice and soft and I havent had any breakouts, since using it. I usually have oily skin, but not for awhile! Nice packaging and product seems to be just the perfect solution for my acne! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Over the Easter holiday I knew we would be outside alot so I tried this for the first time. I didn't smell light sunscreen all day and I didn't get burnt. It was very light on my skin
And I liked that. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really appreciated the Differin Oil Control Moisturizer as it really helped to hydrate my skin and not leave it feeling greasy or sticky. I thought that it was very lightweight and absorbed quickly and efficiently. I have a difficult time finding moisturizers that actually last but thought that this did a good job of hydrating my skin for a good portion of the day. Very useful! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin oil control moisturizer is an amazing feeling lotion for the face. It does an amazing job if oil control and has the benefit of having sunscreen in it as well, which makes for an easy way to get my teens to wear sunscreen, when they normally wouldn't. I love differin products and their acne slaying properties. This one doesn't disappoint! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like they created a formula to control the oil yet and still it's a moisturizer all in one. I feel the advertisement of the bottle could have been designed different. The name doesn't really help you to understand it's for the face. At first I thought it was a hair product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin Oil Control Moisturizer is a great acne treatment. It helps so much with acne but also doesn't dry your face out and keeps it feeling smooth and moisturized. Would highly recommend for anyone. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Awesome love it so much! Does not leave skin oily nor does it leave your skin white or smelly smell of usual sunscreen. The best part yet acne defense mechanism. I
love this product so much i went and bought more ! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I like that this is effective while being gentle. My skin looks better after a couple of uses. My skin also looks and feels great. I like that this absorbs quickly and my skin does not feel oily and greasy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

differin oil control moisturizer leaves my skin super moisturized without leaving it greasy, I only have some areas with acne but it worked perfect for me, I match my skin with moisturizer I just love it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin Oil Control Moisturizer was different than other lotions I've tried, most make my skin break out or look oily after several hours. This lotion was unlike the others, it made my normally over dry skin look healthy and clear. I have very sensitive skin and many products make my skin burn but this lotion didn't. I really like using it and it has added sun protection so it's great for year round use. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I used this moisturizer for a few days but I felt like it was too oily. I thought the consistency seemed ok when dispensed from bottle but on my skin it wasn't great. My skin is a mix of oily in certain areas and then a couple of drier areas on my Chin and neck. I liked the lack of perfume or other odor. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been looking for a moisturizer that will get the job done and this has so far been great. I also love the fact it contains spf which in my case is an added. This definitely works for me and because it is oil free it isn't a hassle. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I have fairly oily and acne prone skin.

This product works great for others who experienced pesky combination skin. This product does a great job at moisturizing the skin but not giving an overwhelming or oily feeling. I like using this at night after cleansing. It's seemed to help with my overall skin health as well! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

My skin can be quite sensitive in spots, and it's combination, so finding the right product can be difficult sometimes. This product so far works, but I always give it a little longer to make sure that it doesn't have an adverse effect after a few weeks. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This moisturizer is awesome. It makes my skin super soft and smooth and doesn't cause me to break out. It's not greasy and works great under my primer before I put my foundation on. It has little to no smell which is also great for my sensitive skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differing is great for an everyday moisturizer for anyone with sensitive skin. I have used it for my daily moisturizer before applying make up to give me extra coverage living in the hot sun. It is a great oil free lotion with SPF to protect your face! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this stuff! Usually sun screen products cause my face to break out or burn, but this one doesn't at all. It blocks the sun and provides really good moisture to my skin. Thin lotion, not thick either. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love this moisturizer and sunscreen combo. It goes on smooth and quickly absorbed into skin. Fragrance free, nicely concentrated - perfect for me. It keeps my skin moisturized for hours while protecting my skin from sun's UV rays. Love it !! I would highly recommend this product to my friends. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I really like this moisturizer. It's not greasy or sticky, it feels really light on my face and I dont have that dry feeling that I would normally have not using a moisturizer. I definitely recommend giving this product a try! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love it because it helps protect your skin without clogging your pores. It's fragrance free too and i love that because i have some issues with certain smells. I also love that it is hypoallergenic. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have he hardest time ever finding anything that will work for my face. This product is amazing! My skin is less oily throughout the day and seems to be getting clearer. It goes on nice and smooth and dries quickly! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Differin moisturizer with sunscreen and oil control Is really nice! I like that it does not have much of scent, It doesn't make my skin feel oily or have a greasy feeling that some other lotions do! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin is a wonderful product I used it on my skin and it had a really good texture to it I really liked it a lot I would highly suggest getting some it will be very good for you know dry skin and help me out a lot so I love it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love differin oil moisturizer on my skin it cleared my acne up in a few days thank you so much! I definitely would recommend this product to everyone I know and I am very pleased to receive this item. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I'm glad I tried this as it most definitely helped control oil on my face and moisturized a lot! My skin felt alot smoother and softer after using it definitely felt my skin was hydrated! It didn't feel oil on my skin and only had to use a little as a little went a long ways. I like that it's reasonable priced and easy to use I will purchase this again and I recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This is an excellent daily moisturizer! It smells a bit like alcohol at first when applying but quickly blends in/goes away, its comfortable to wear daily and I'm glad it has extra SPF. I think its improved my skin as well. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am a fan of Differin products because they help me with my acne problem. This moisturizer helps me to have a more hydrated skin, without being greasy or having acne breakouts. It has a creamy and smooth texture. It is easily absorbed in the skin. I use it twice a day, and it does not interfere with my makeup products. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Its my 1st time trying this moisturizer. Its oil free and non greasy. It works great. It has cautions to use. Dont apply near eyes. Use 15 minuets before sun exposion. I like it for my dry skin. Its fragrance free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin Oil Control Moisturizer Protect your skin from the sunâ€”without clogging your pores. Oil-free lightweight, non-greasy, non-comedogenic, hypoallergenic and fragrance-free. Differin Oil Control Moisturizer with sunscreen is an integral step to your daily skincare routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have a combination skin and was stuck on only on moisturizer for a long time so i thought of trying a new one. I have just used it a few days and its better than the one I used before, a good sunscreen. Now I dont need a moisturizer and sunscreen to use, now I have two in one solution. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I think this lotion did it's job. I didn't think it was oily on my face like some and absorbed pretty well. I didn't feel like it clogged my pores and was pretty gentle. Super happy it was fragrance free. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I got this for my nephew who has bad acne at the moment. He already uses the differin and now he has the moisturizer to use as well. I believe this is a great combo to use when you have oily skin and his face is starting to clear up. He has been using it daily and already asked me to buy him so more. He stated he likes both products and wants to use them as his daily routine. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differin oil control works great! My 18-year-old daughter has acne-prone skin and this has made a huge difference, since she has been using it. And as an added bonus, it doesn't dry her skin out like other acne products seem to do. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I felt that it worked to a certain extent. I am giving it a four star because it did control my oily skin,but I did not see a difference between this product & the other products;I have used in the past.
**I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review** [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have had acne since high school and even as an adult in my mid 20s, it has still remained. It's gotten better but I still get breakouts occasionally. I also have patches of dry skin, especially during the winter. I was happy to review Differin because it addressed both of my skin issues. My skin wasn't flaky and my acne seemed to improve. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

So I suffer from sensitive combination skin at times and other times from just oily skin. It's hard to find anything that works and doesn't irritate me and so far this has been good to me. I get occasional breakouts and I haven't had one since using this so that's been a major plus for me. I love how it has spf protection and doesn't feel heavy on my face, overall a very good product :) [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Differen really helped clear up most of my acne, once i started usuing it i really noticed a change and lets be honest does it work 100% no but what does? over all a good product would recommend and i would purchase once i run out. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is what i been looking for in a face and ance solution iy helps me in so many ways it makes my skin soft and smooth after the first use. I need more of this product and i highly recommend it [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I had my son use this to help with his acne and it made a huge difference!!! I will be sure to grab him more the next time he needs it!! This stuff is fantastic and he didn't complain about a "girly" smell like with most facial products [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have oily skin but it does get dry, especially in the winter. I have used different moisturizers that moisturize well but then leave my skin feeling very oily. The Differin Oil Control Moisturizer is the first product that I have used that can moisturize my face without adding oil to it. It's magical! My skin has never looked so good. I love that it also contains some protection from the sun because we all know how damaging the sun is on skin. My skin is glowing and looking so fresh. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I don't suffer from heavy acne, but I do frequently get blemishes and using this has helped reduce that frequency. I actually use this about every 3 days as an alternative moisturizer and I really have seen a difference in my skin. I will also mention I do not have super oily skin, so I can't speak to that aspect.
